techmeme.title: Apple files an emergency motion to halt the remedy trial of the DOJ vs. Google case while it appeals a court's denial of its request to intervene as a defendant (Lauren Feiner/The Verge)
Grayscale launches a dogecoin-focused fund, says it has "transitioned from a memecoin" to a tool for "global financial inclusion and a viable means of payment" (Arasu Kannagi Basil/Reuters)
Israel-based Seraphic Security, whose product allows customers to securely access SaaS and private web applications, raised a $29M Series A led by GreatPoint (Ryan Naraine/SecurityWeek)
Tether had $13B in 2024 net profits, including ~$7B from its US Treasuries and repo holdings, and $5B from unrealized appreciation of gold and bitcoin holdings (Krisztian Sandor/CoinDesk)
Source: Anton Levy is stepping down as General Atlantic's co-president and chairman of global technology; Levy led investments in Alibaba, Facebook, and more (Dan Primack/Axios)
